data.scheme_name: Subsidy Scheme for export of agriculture commodities by sea route - New
data.benefits: Scheme provides subsidy upto 1 Lakh to the eligible beneficiary exporting designated commodities
data.eligibility:
1. The Co-operative Society, Farmer Producer Group/ Company, Firm, Exporter, Farmer registered in Maharashtra who will export designated agriculture commodity to the destinations are eligible. 
  2. The scheme is eligible for specified countries and corresponding commodities only
data.conditions:
1. It is mandatory that the Co-operative Society, Farmers' Producer Company, company, firm, exporter, farmer should directly export the agri. produce by sea route container. 
  2. The scheme is not eligible for the traders/exporters working on behalf of Co-operative Society. 
  3. The Co-operative Society or Farmers' Producer Company shall apply for the said scheme, only after receipt of the payment of the exported goods, so that non-receipt of the payment of the consignment due to quality issues will be not eligible for the benefit of the scheme. 
  4. The scheme will not be eligible for exporting sample of agro produce.
data.beneficiaries:
1. The Co-operative Society, Farmer Producer Group/ Company, Firm, Exporter, Farmer registered in Maharashtra who will export designated agriculture commodity to the destinations are eligible. 
  2. The scheme is eligible for specified countries and corresponding commodities only
data.prerequisites:
1. It is mandatory that the Co-operative Society, Farmers' Producer Company, company, firm, exporter, farmer should directly export the agri. produce by sea route container. 
  2. The scheme is not eligible for the traders/exporters working on behalf of Co-operative Society. 
  3. The Co-operative Society or Farmers' Producer Company shall apply for the said scheme, only after receipt of the payment of the exported goods, so that non-receipt of the payment of the consignment due to quality issues will be not eligible for the benefit of the scheme. 
  4. The scheme will not be eligible for exporting sample of agro produce.
data.context:
1. In order to boost the export of agriculture commodities grown in Maharashtra state, a proposal was under consideration of Maharashtra State Agriculture Marketing Board for financial assistance to Cooperative Society, Farmer Producer Group/ Company, Firm, Exporter, Farmer for direct export of fruits and vegetables (excluding grapes), if it is exported through sea route through container. 
  2. Therefore a Transport Assistance Scheme has been launched. It has decided to reserve a fund of Rs. 1 Crore for the scheme.
data.objective: This scheme is launched in order to increase the involvement of Cooperative Societies and Farmer Producer Companies in agriculture export.
data.description:
1. The Cooperative Society, Farmer Producer Group/ Company, Firm, Exporter, Farmer who will export designated agriculture commodity to the destinations, will be eligible for getting Rs. 50,000/- per container (20 feet/40 feet) as subsidy. 
  2. The maximum subsidy per beneficiary will be Rs. 1 Lakh per year.
data.how_to_apply:
1. The applicant, Co-operative Society or Farmers' Producer Company shall submit the application in prescribed format along with the required documents and the bills of the container supplier company. 
  2. Mandatory documents required for the eligibility of the transport subsidy scheme: 
    • Application in prescribed format.
    • Invoice copy
    • Shipping bill 
    • Container freight receipt e. Bank Realization Certificate showing credit of foreign exchange.
  3. The Exporter should submit the relevant Document to Division Offices of MSAMB within prescribed period. 
  4. The Co-operative Society or Farmers' Producer Company shall apply for the said scheme, only after receipt of the payment of the exported goods, so that non-receipt of the payment of the consignment due to quality issues will be not eligible for the benefit of the scheme.
data.funding_mechanism: Incentive will be released on approval of application by the concerned authority after fulfilment of condition
data.additional_info:
1. USA- Mango, Pomegranate 
  2. Australia- Mango, Pomegranate 
  3. South Korea- Banana, Mango 
  4. Kazakhstan (via Bandar Abbas Port)- Mango 
  5. Afghanistan (via Bandar Abbas Port)- Banana, Onion 
  6. Iran- Banana, Mandarin, Mango 
  7. Russia- Banana, Mango 
  8. Mauritius- Onion, Mango 
  9. Latvia (via Rega Port)- Vegetables and Onion 
  10. European Union- Mango, Pomegranate 
  11. Canada- Mango, Pomegranate 
  12. All Countries- Orange
data.checklist_info_a:
1. Application Form*
2. Invoice copy*
3. Shipping bill
4. Container freight receipt
5. Bank Realization Certificate showing credit of foreign exchange
6. Guarantee Letter*
7. Other relevant document (as required)
The Exporter should submit the relevant Document to Division Offices of MSAMB within prescribed period
data.checklist_info_c:
Invoice format- https://www.msamb.com/Export/InvoiceFormat,
Application Format- https://www.msamb.com/Documents/export_scheme_application.pdf,
Guarantee letter- https://www.msamb.com/Documents/guarantee_letter.pdf
